level.heading: Transfer to public benefit conveyance applicant.
level.text: Notwithstanding Chapter 8 of this title, the Mayor is authorized to transfer the subject real property to the applicable public benefit conveyance applicant in accordance with the terms of the applicable Memorandum of Agreement.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 19-175, see notes under ยง 10-1901.
